losalgoritmos

Class LosAlgoritmos

  • java.lang.Object
    • losalgoritmos.LosAlgoritmos

  • public class LosAlgoritmos
extends java.lang.Object
    Functionality for managing the different routing algorithms. !!! THIS CLASS COULD BE REMOVED WITH SOME REFACTORING, PROBABLY WILL BE AT SOME POINT !!! The routing algorithms save all necessary information to the VertexMatrix, each vertex knows if it is on the shortest path and what was the distance to it.
